member.summary: Creates a new Overwatch process.

member.summary: Creates new CustomGame object.

member.summary: Positions the Overwatch window to be usable by the CustomGame class.

member.summary: Disables input for the Overwatch window.

member.name: M:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.CustomGame.EnableOverwatchWindowInput
member.summary: Enables input for the Overwatch window after disabling it with .

member.name: M:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.CustomGame.GetGameState
member.summary:
Returns the state of the game.
In lobby: GameState.InLobby
Waiting for players: GameState.Waiting
Ingame: GameState.Ingame
Commending players: GameState.Ending_Commend
member.returns: Returns the state of the game.

member.name: M:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.CustomGame.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes of all resources being used by the CustomGame instance.

member.name: E:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.CustomGame.OnGameOver
member.summary: Events that are executed when the game is over. To get the winning team, blue team must have "\" on the start of their name, and red needs "*" on the start of their name.

member.name: F:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.CustomGame.Pause
member.summary: Controls Overwatch's pause feature.

member.summary: Get player count of red team and blue team.

member.summary: Gets the slots filled in red team and blue team.

member.name: P:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.CustomGame.BlueCount
member.summary: Gets the player count of blue team.

member.name: P:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.CustomGame.BlueSlots
member.summary: Gets the slots filled in blue team.

member.name: P:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.CustomGame.RedCount
member.summary: Gets the player count of red team.

member.name: P:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.CustomGame.RedSlots
member.summary: Gets the slots filled in red team.

member.summary: Gets the number of players in the queue.

member.name: P:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.CustomGame.QueueSlots
member.summary: Gets the slots filled in the queue.

member.summary: Gets the number of players in spectator.

member.name: P:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.CustomGame.SpectatorSlots
member.summary: Gets the slots filled in spectator excluding the first slot.

member.name: M:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.CustomGame.GetInvitedCount
member.summary: Gets the number of players who were invited but are not ingame.
member.returns: Number of players who are not ingame.

member.name: M:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.CustomGame.GetInvitedSlots
member.summary: Gets a list of players who were invited but are not ingame.
member.returns: Integer list of players who are not ingame.

member.name: P:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.CustomGame.TotalPlayerCount
member.summary: Gets the total amount of players in the custom game server.

member.name: P:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.CustomGame.TotalPlayerSlots
member.summary: Gets all the slots of every player in the custom game server. Does not include players in queue.

member.summary: Returns true if the slot is blue, red, spectator, or in queue.

member.summary: Returns true if the slot is in blue.

member.summary: Returns true if the slot is in red.

member.summary: Returns true if the slot is in Spectator.

member.summary: Gets slots in the game.
member.returns: Returns a list of slots following .

member.name: M:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.CustomGame.WaitForSlotUpdate(System.Int32)
member.summary: Waits for the slots in overwatch to change.
member.param: Time to wait. Set to -1 to wait forever.
member.returns: Returns true if Overwatch's slots changed. Returns false if the time ran out.

member.summary: Invites a player to the game via battletag.

Team that the invited player joins.

member.summary: Modes enabled in custom games.

member.summary: The current event occuring in Overwatch.

member.name: M:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.CustomGame.GetCurrentOverwatchEvent
member.summary: Gets the current Overwatch event. This compares the current date with past event's start and end times, so specific time may be a little off.
member.returns: The current Overwatch event as the Event enum.

member.summary: Sends server to the lobby.

member.name: M:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.CustomGame.SetHeroSettings(Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.SetHero[])
member.summary: Change individual hero settings.
member.param: Settings of the heroes you want to change.
member.exception: Thrown when a 's set and setto length are not equal length.
Thrown when any of the settings do not exist for their respective heros or if a set's respective setto is not the correct type.
member.remarks: The complete list of settings can be found Toggle settings require a boolean. Value and dropdown settings require an integer.

member.name: F:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.CustomGame.Settings
member.summary: Custom Game settings in Overwatch.

member.name: T:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.AI
member.summary: AI settings for Overwatch.
member.remarks: The AI class is accessed in a CustomGame object on the field.

member.name: M:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.AI.AddAI(Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.AIHero,Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.Difficulty,Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.BotTeam,System.Int32)
member.summary: Add AI to the game.
member.param: Amount of AI that is added. Set to -1 for max. Default is -1
member.returns: Returns false if no AI can be added.
member.exception: Thrown if count is less than -1.

member.name: M:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.AI.GetAIDifficultyMarkup(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Obtains the markup of an AI's difficulty.
member.param: Garanteed index of difficulty. (0 = easy, 1 = medium, 2 = hard)

member.name: M:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.AI.GetAIDifficulty(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Gets the difficulty of the AI in the input slot.
If the input slot is not an AI, returns null. If checking an AI's difficulty in the queue, it will always return easy, or null if it is a player.
member.returns: Returns the if the difficulty is found. Returns null if the input slot is not an AI.
member.exception: Thrown if is not a valid slot.

member.name: M:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.AI.RemoveAllBotsAuto
member.summary: Removes all AI from the game.
member.returns: Returns true if successful.

member.name: M:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.AI.IsAI(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Checks if the input slot is an AI.
member.param: Determines if the captured screen should be updated before scanning.
member.returns: Returns true if slot is AI.
member.exception: Thrown if is not a valid slot.

member.name: M:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.AI.GetAISlots
member.summary: Gets all slots that are AI.
member.returns: All AI slots.

member.name: M:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.AI.GetPlayerSlots
member.summary: Gets all slots that are not AI.
member.returns: All player slots.

member.name: M:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.AI.CalibrateAIChecking
member.summary: AI checking is determined by looking for the commendation icon of players. Sometimes, this icon is missing. This fixes it.

member.name: M:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.AI.EditAI(System.Int32,Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.AIHero,Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.Difficulty)
member.summary: Edits the hero an AI is playing and the difficulty of the AI.
member.returns: Returns true on success.
member.exception: Thrown if is not a valid slot.

member.name: M:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.AI.EditAI(System.Int32,Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.AIHero)
member.summary: Edits the hero an AI is playing.
member.returns: Returns true on success.
member.exception: Thrown if is not a valid slot.

member.name: M:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.AI.EditAI(System.Int32,Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.Difficulty)
member.summary: Edits the difficulty of an AI.
member.returns: Returns true on success.
member.exception: Thrown if is not a valid slot.

member.name: M:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.AI.RemoveFromGameIfAI(System.Int32)
member.summary: Safely removes a slot from the game if they are an AI.
member.returns: Returns true if the slot is an AI and removing them from the game was successful.
member.exception: Thrown if is not a valid slot.

member.summary: Get max player count for both teams.
member.returns: Returns an int[] where [0] is blue max player count and [1] is red max player count.

member.name: M:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.PlayerInfo.IsHeroChosen(System.Int32)
member.summary: Test if input slot has chosen a hero.
member.returns: Returns true if a hero is chosen.
member.exception: Thrown if is not a valid slot.

member.name: M:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.PlayerInfo.ModeratorSlot
member.summary: Gets the slot the moderator is on.
member.returns: Slot the moderator is on.

member.returns: Team that the player is queueing for.
member.exception: Thrown if is not a valid slot.

member.summary: Checks if the input slot has their ultimate.
member.returns: Returns true if player as ultimate.
member.exception: Thrown if is not a valid slot.

Location on the file system to save it to.
member.exception: Thrown if is not a valid slot.

member.summary: Gets the hero a player is playing.

member.name: T:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.ScreenshotMethod
member.summary: The screenshot method used to capture the Overwatch window screen. BitBlt is faster and works even if another window is over the Overwatch window. If BitBlt does not work for you, use ScreenCopy.

member.summary: The BitBlt method of screen capturing.

member.name: F:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.ScreenshotMethod.ScreenCopy
member.summary: The ScreenCopy method of screen capturing.

member.name: F:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.User32.nCmdShow.SW_HIDE
member.summary: Hides the window and activates another window.

member.name: F:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.User32.nCmdShow.SW_SHOWNORMAL
member.summary: Activates and displays a window. If the window is minimized or maximized, the system restores it to its original size and position. An application should specify this flag when displaying the window for the first time.

member.name: F:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.User32.nCmdShow.SW_SHOWMINIMIZED
member.summary: Activates the window and displays it as a minimized window.

member.name: F:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.User32.nCmdShow.SW_SHOWMAXIMIZED
member.summary: Activates the window and displays it as a maximized window.

member.name: F:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.User32.nCmdShow.SW_SHOWNOACTIVATE
member.summary: Displays a window in its most recent size and position. This value is similar to SW_SHOWNORMAL, except that the window is not activated.

member.name: F:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.User32.nCmdShow.SW_SHOW
member.summary: Activates the window and displays it in its current size and position.

member.name: F:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.User32.nCmdShow.SW_MINIMIZE
member.summary: Minimizes the specified window and activates the next top-level window in the Z order.

member.name: F:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.User32.nCmdShow.SW_SHOWMINNOACTIVE
member.summary: Displays the window as a minimized window. This value is similar to SW_SHOWMINIMIZED, except the window is not activated.

member.name: F:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.User32.nCmdShow.SW_SHOWNA
member.summary: Displays the window in its current size and position. This value is similar to SW_SHOW, except that the window is not activated.

member.name: F:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.User32.nCmdShow.SW_RESTORE
member.summary: Activates and displays the window. If the window is minimized or maximized, the system restores it to its original size and position. An application should specify this flag when restoring a minimized window.

member.name: F:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.User32.nCmdShow.SW_SHOWDEFAULT
member.summary: Sets the show state based on the SW_ value specified in the STARTUPINFO structure passed to the CreateProcess function by the program that started the application.

member.name: F:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.User32.nCmdShow.SW_FORCEMINIMIZE
member.summary: Minimizes a window, even if the thread that owns the window is not responding. This flag should only be used when minimizing windows from a different thread.

member.name: F:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.Gdi32.TernaryRasterOperations.SRCCOPY
member.summary: dest = source

member.name: F:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.Gdi32.TernaryRasterOperations.SRCPAINT
member.summary: dest = source OR dest

member.name: F:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.Gdi32.TernaryRasterOperations.SRCAND
member.summary: dest = source AND dest

member.name: F:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.Gdi32.TernaryRasterOperations.SRCINVERT
member.summary: dest = source XOR dest

member.name: F:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.Gdi32.TernaryRasterOperations.SRCERASE
member.summary: dest = source AND (NOT dest)

member.name: F:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.Gdi32.TernaryRasterOperations.NOTSRCCOPY
member.summary: dest = (NOT source)

member.name: F:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.Gdi32.TernaryRasterOperations.NOTSRCERASE
member.summary: dest = (NOT src) AND (NOT dest)

member.name: F:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.Gdi32.TernaryRasterOperations.MERGECOPY
member.summary: dest = (source AND pattern)

member.name: F:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.Gdi32.TernaryRasterOperations.MERGEPAINT
member.summary: dest = (NOT source) OR dest

member.name: F:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.Gdi32.TernaryRasterOperations.PATCOPY
member.summary: dest = pattern

member.name: F:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.Gdi32.TernaryRasterOperations.PATPAINT
member.summary: dest = DPSnoo

member.name: F:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.Gdi32.TernaryRasterOperations.PATINVERT
member.summary: dest = pattern XOR dest

member.name: F:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.Gdi32.TernaryRasterOperations.DSTINVERT
member.summary: dest = (NOT dest)

member.name: F:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.Gdi32.TernaryRasterOperations.BLACKNESS
member.summary: dest = BLACK

member.name: F:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.Gdi32.TernaryRasterOperations.WHITENESS
member.summary: dest = WHITE

member.name: F:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.Gdi32.TernaryRasterOperations.CAPTUREBLT
member.summary: Capture window as seen on screen. This includes layered windows such as WPF windows with AllowsTransparency="true"

member.summary: All heroes in Overwatch.

member.name: T:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.Settings
member.summary: Custom Game settings in Overwatch.
member.remarks: The Settings class is accessed in a CustomGame object on the field.

member.name: M:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.Settings.LoadPreset(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Loads a preset saved in Overwatch.
member.param: Preset to load. 0 is the first preset
Maximum time to wait for the preset to show up.
member.returns: Returns true if selecting the preset was successful.
member.exception: Throw if is less than 0.

member.name: M:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.Settings.SetNumPresets(System.Int32)
member.summary: Informs library of total number of saved presets. May make preset loading faster or more accurate.
member.param: Number of saved presets the host has.

member.name: M:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.Settings.SetJoinSetting(Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.Join)
member.summary: Changes who can join.

member.name: M:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.Settings.SetGameName(System.String)
member.summary: Changes the custom game's name.
member.param: Name to change game name to.
member.exception: Thrown if is less than 3 characters or greater than 64 characters.
Thrown if has the text "admin" in it.

member.name: M:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.Settings.SetTeamName(Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.PlayerTeam,System.String)
member.summary: Changes a team's name.
member.param: Name to change team's name to.
member.exception: Thrown if is less than 1 character or greater than 15 characters.
Thown if has the text "admin" in it.

member.name: M:Deltin.CustomGameAutomation.Settings.SetMaxPlayers(System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Sets the max player count for blue team, red team, free for all, or spectators.
member.param: Maximum number of blue players. Must be in the range of 1-6. Set to null to ignore.
Maximum number of red players. Must be in the range of 1-6. Set to null to ignore.
Maximum number of FFA players. Must be in the range of 1-12. Set to null to ignore.
Maximum number of spectators. Must be in the range of 0-12. Set to null to ignore.
member.exception: Thrown if , , , or is less than 0 or greater than their max values.
